title: Tech companies are still going public in Asia, but not enough to halt the global IPO slowdown - TechCrunch
content: Tech companies are still going public in Asia, but not enough to halt the global IPO slowdown  TechCrunch
description: Asia-based companies accounted for nine out of the top 10 IPOs in the first quarter of 2022, which raises the question: Is Asia a haven for public exits amid the current global slowdown?
